issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
After running a few successful failover tests on both CLC and Walrus, I saw in one run the following describe-services output on the active CLC (system still up in this state). Note that the secondary Walrus is not appearing:
{code}
root@eucahost-51-85 ~]# /opt/eucalyptus/usr/sbin/euca-describe-services 
SERVICE dns             eucalyptus      192.168.51.85   BROKEN          289     http://192.168.51.85:8773/services/Dns          arn:euca:eucalyptus::dns:192.168.51.85/
SERVICE eucalyptus      eucalyptus      192.168.51.101  ENABLED         289     http://192.168.51.101:8773/services/Eucalyptus  arn:euca:eucalyptus:::192.168.51.101/
SERVICE eucalyptus      eucalyptus      192.168.51.85   DISABLED        289     http://192.168.51.85:8773/services/Eucalyptus   arn:euca:eucalyptus:::192.168.51.85/
SERVICE bootstrap       bootstrap       192.168.51.85   ENABLED         289     http://192.168.51.85:8773/services/Empyrean     arn:euca:bootstrap:::192.168.51.85/
SERVICE walrus          walrus          WS_85           ENABLED         289     http://192.168.51.85:8773/services/Walrus       arn:euca:bootstrap:walrus:walrus:WS_85/
SERVICE cluster         PARTI00         CC_115          DISABLED        289     http://192.168.51.115:8774/axis2/services/EucalyptusCC  arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI00:cluster:CC_115/
SERVICE cluster         PARTI00         CC_127          ENABLED         289     http://192.168.51.127:8774/axis2/services/EucalyptusCC  arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI00:cluster:CC_127/
SERVICE storage         PARTI00         SC_115          ENABLED         289     http://192.168.51.115:8773/services/Storage     arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI00:storage:SC_115/
SERVICE storage         PARTI00         SC_127          DISABLED        289     http://192.168.51.127:8773/services/Storage     arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI00:storage:SC_127/
[root@eucahost-51-85 ~]#
{code}

From the perspective of the inactive walrus:
{code}
[root@eucahost-51-101 ~]# /opt/eucalyptus/usr/sbin/euca-describe-services 
SERVICE dns             eucalyptus      192.168.51.101  BROKEN          289     http://192.168.51.101:8773/services/Dns         arn:euca:eucalyptus::dns:192.168.51.101/
SERVICE bootstrap       bootstrap       192.168.51.101  ENABLED         289     http://192.168.51.101:8773/services/Empyrean    arn:euca:bootstrap:::192.168.51.101/
SERVICE cluster         PARTI00         CC_115          DISABLED        289     http://192.168.51.115:8774/axis2/services/EucalyptusCC  arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI00:cluster:CC_115/
SERVICE cluster         PARTI00         CC_127          ENABLED         289     http://192.168.51.127:8774/axis2/services/EucalyptusCC  arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI00:cluster:CC_127/
SERVICE storage         PARTI00         SC_115          ENABLED         289     http://192.168.51.115:8773/services/Storage     arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI00:storage:SC_115/
SERVICE storage         PARTI00         SC_127          DISABLED        289     http://192.168.51.127:8773/services/Storage     arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI00:storage:SC_127/
SERVICE walrus          walrus          WS_101          INITIALIZED     289     http://192.168.51.101:8773/services/Walrus      arn:euca:bootstrap:walrus:walrus:WS_101/
SERVICE walrus          walrus          WS_85           ENABLED         289     http://192.168.51.85:8773/services/Walrus       arn:euca:bootstrap:walrus:walrus:WS_85/
SERVICE eucalyptus      eucalyptus      192.168.51.101  ENABLED         289     http://192.168.51.101:8773/services/Eucalyptus  arn:euca:eucalyptus:::192.168.51.101/
SERVICE eucalyptus      eucalyptus      192.168.51.85   DISABLED        289     http://192.168.51.85:8773/services/Eucalyptus   arn:euca:eucalyptus:::192.168.51.85/
[root@eucahost-51-101 ~]# 
{code}

DRBD is currently Primary on the correct ENABLED Walrus:
{code}
[root@eucahost-51-85 ~]# cat /proc/drbd 
version: 8.3.13 (api:88/proto:86-96)
GIT-hash: 83ca112086600faacab2f157bc5a9324f7bd7f77 build by dag@Build64R6, 2012-09-04 12:06:10

 1: cs:Connected ro:Primary/Secondary ds:UpToDate/UpToDate C r-----
    ns:1049160 nr:0 dw:492 dr:1049664 al:15 bm:199 lo:0 pe:0 ua:0 ap:0 ep:1 wo:b oos:0
[root@eucahost-51-85 ~]# 
{code}

Not seeing anything useful in the logs from the walrus that stayed in INITIALIZED state.
fields.summary: HA: Walrus failover caused walrus service to disappear

comments.body: Walrus remains in INITIALIZED. Chris said this happens if load is failing, however, it is not failing in WalrusBootstrapper. All that load does is check "drbdadm status"

This is strange.

On the ENABLED CLC, we see:

[root@eucahost-51-101 ~]# /opt/eucalyptus/usr/sbin/euca-describe-walruses 
WALRUS	walrus         	WS_85          	192.168.51.85            	ENABLED	{}
WALRUS	walrus         	WS_101         	192.168.51.101           	INITIALIZED	{}
[root@eucahost-51-101 ~]# /opt/eucalyptus/usr/sbin/euca-describe-services 
SERVICE	dns            	eucalyptus     	192.168.51.101 	ENABLED   	290 	http://192.168.51.101:8773/services/Dns 	arn:euca:eucalyptus::dns:192.168.51.101/
SERVICE	bootstrap      	bootstrap      	192.168.51.101 	ENABLED   	290 	http://192.168.51.101:8773/services/Empyrean	arn:euca:bootstrap:::192.168.51.101/
SERVICE	cluster        	PARTI00        	CC_115         	DISABLED  	290 	http://192.168.51.115:8774/axis2/services/EucalyptusCC	arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI00:cluster:CC_115/
SERVICE	cluster        	PARTI00        	CC_127         	ENABLED   	290 	http://192.168.51.127:8774/axis2/services/EucalyptusCC	arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI00:cluster:CC_127/
SERVICE	storage        	PARTI00        	SC_115         	ENABLED   	290 	http://192.168.51.115:8773/services/Storage	arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI00:storage:SC_115/
SERVICE	storage        	PARTI00        	SC_127         	DISABLED  	290 	http://192.168.51.127:8773/services/Storage	arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI00:storage:SC_127/
SERVICE	walrus         	walrus         	WS_101         	INITIALIZED	290 	http://192.168.51.101:8773/services/Walrus	arn:euca:bootstrap:walrus:walrus:WS_101/
SERVICE	walrus         	walrus         	WS_85          	ENABLED   	290 	http://192.168.51.85:8773/services/Walrus	arn:euca:bootstrap:walrus:walrus:WS_85/
SERVICE	eucalyptus     	eucalyptus     	192.168.51.101 	ENABLED   	290 	http://192.168.51.101:8773/services/Eucalyptus	arn:euca:eucalyptus:::192.168.51.101/
SERVICE	eucalyptus     	eucalyptus     	192.168.51.85  	DISABLED  	290 	http://192.168.51.85:8773/services/Eucalyptus	arn:euca:eucalyptus:::192.168.51.85/


On the DISABLED CLC:

[root@eucahost-51-85 ~]#  /opt/eucalyptus/usr/sbin/euca-describe-walruses 
WALRUS	walrus         	WS_85          	192.168.51.85            	ENABLED	{}
WALRUS	walrus         	WS_101         	192.168.51.101           	PRIMORDIAL	{}
[root@eucahost-51-85 ~]# /opt/eucalyptus/usr/sbin/euca-describe-services 
SERVICE	dns            	eucalyptus     	192.168.51.85  	DISABLED  	290 	http://192.168.51.85:8773/services/Dns  	arn:euca:eucalyptus::dns:192.168.51.85/
SERVICE	eucalyptus     	eucalyptus     	192.168.51.101 	ENABLED   	290 	http://192.168.51.101:8773/services/Eucalyptus	arn:euca:eucalyptus:::192.168.51.101/
SERVICE	eucalyptus     	eucalyptus     	192.168.51.85  	DISABLED  	290 	http://192.168.51.85:8773/services/Eucalyptus	arn:euca:eucalyptus:::192.168.51.85/
SERVICE	bootstrap      	bootstrap      	192.168.51.85  	ENABLED   	290 	http://192.168.51.85:8773/services/Empyrean	arn:euca:bootstrap:::192.168.51.85/
SERVICE	walrus         	walrus         	WS_85          	ENABLED   	290 	http://192.168.51.85:8773/services/Walrus	arn:euca:bootstrap:walrus:walrus:WS_85/
SERVICE	cluster        	PARTI00        	CC_115         	DISABLED  	290 	http://192.168.51.115:8774/axis2/services/EucalyptusCC	arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI00:cluster:CC_115/
SERVICE	cluster        	PARTI00        	CC_127         	ENABLED   	290 	http://192.168.51.127:8774/axis2/services/EucalyptusCC	arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI00:cluster:CC_127/
SERVICE	storage        	PARTI00        	SC_115         	ENABLED   	290 	http://192.168.51.115:8773/services/Storage	arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI00:storage:SC_115/
SERVICE	storage        	PARTI00        	SC_127         	DISABLED  	290 	http://192.168.51.127:8773/services/Storage	arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI00:storage:SC_127/

More info:

Tue Nov 13 23:11:41 2012 ERROR [Topology:Eucalyptus.bootstrap:EphemeralConfiguration:arn:euca:bootstrap:Topology::external/.class java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker#61] [com.eucalyptus.component.Topology$TopologyChange.doTopologyChange(Topology.java):1166] START:DISABLED  arn:euca:eucalyptus:::192.168.51.101/ INITIALIZED->DISABLED=PRIMORDIAL [Failed to lookup service corresponding to service configuration: 192.168.51.101]

Tue Nov 13 23:11:41 2012 ERROR [Hosts:Incoming-1,null] [com.eucalyptus.bootstrap.Hosts$SetupRemoteServiceConfigurations.apply(Hosts.java):215] java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: java.lang.RuntimeException: java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: java.util.NoSuchElementException: Failed to lookup service corresponding to service configuration: 192.168.51.101
Cannot repro.  Please reopen if we get it trapped.
